hero.title: Valtio
hero.subtitle: Simple and fast state management for React
hero.description: Valtio makes proxy-state simple for React. It's a thin layer over Zustand, making it easy to use with React hooks.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Install Valtio and start building reactive applications
gettingStarted.installDescription: Install the package with your favorite package manager

features.title: Features
features.proxyDesc: Use JavaScript's Proxy API for reactive state
features.typescriptDesc: Full TypeScript support with type inference
